Selecting Date and Time Information

Contents | Index

You use the calendar control to select date and time information for a date/time field. You access the calendar control by clicking the calendar button in any date or time field.

To select a new date or time
  1. In the date or time field, click the calendar button.
    The calendar control appears.
  2. To change the month and the year, click the month or the year and then click a new value.
  3. To select a date, click the date in the calendar.
    The date you select is highlighted.
  4. Use the hour slide bar and the minute slide bar to specify the time.
  5. Click Done.

Note: You can set Strict Date Format in User Preferences. This preference enforces a deployment-wide standard date format and overrides all display formats defined in Siebel Tools. It applies to date information only. For example, a particular control is set to MM/DD/YY hh:mm where strict date format is set to DD/MM/YYYY. The date portion of that format is replaced by the strict date format and the resulting format is DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm.
